name: Infiltration (itch) (MCjammydodger)
description:
Infiltration is a stealth action game. Take control of secret agents as they try to infiltrate an enemy base built into a mountain side.

The game can be played by one player or by two players in split-screen co-op.

The game should be played using controllers.

Control scheme, based on an Xbox controller:

Move - Left stick
Toggle Run - Press left stick
Change view - Left trigger
Attack - Right Trigger
Cycle Weapons - Y
Interact - X
Pause - Start
